Change things from this point onOpenStack Vitrage is the OpenStack RCA (Root Cause Analysis) Service for organizing, analyzing and expanding OpenStack alarms & events, yielding insights regarding the root cause of problems and deducing the existence of problems before they are directly detected.Enabling Vitrage in DevStack----------------------------More details in: `README file <devstack/README.rst>`_Project Resources-----------------* Project documentation: https://docs.openstack.org/vitrage/latest/* Wiki page: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Vitrage* Source: https://opendev.org/openstack/vitrage* StoryBoard: https://storyboard.openstack.org/#!/project/openstack/vitrage* Release notes: https://docs.openstack.org/releasenotes/vitrage* Design specifications: https://specs.openstack.org/openstack/vitrage-specs/
